data.lyric:
[ti:Monster]
[ar:Shawn Mendes/Justin Bieber]
[al:Monster]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Monster - Shawn Mendes (肖恩·蒙德兹)/Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)
[00:03.63]Lyrics by：Shawn Mendes/Justin Bieber/Ashton Simmonds/Adam King Feeney/Mustafa Ahmed
[00:07.27]Composed by：Shawn Mendes/Justin Bieber/Ashton Simmonds/Adam King Feeney/Mustafa Ahmed
[00:10.91]Shawn Mendes：
[00:13.22]You put me on a pedestal and tell me I'm the best
[00:19.88]Raise me up into the sky until I'm short of breath
[00:24.39]Yeah
[00:26.47]Fill me up with confidence I say what's in my chest
[00:29.71]Spill my words and tear me down until there's nothing left
[00:32.93]Rearrange the pieces just to fit me with the rest yeah
[00:36.40]Shawn Mendes：
[00:37.76]But what if I what if I trip
[00:41.26]What if I what if I fall
[00:44.86]Then am I the monster
[00:48.44]Just let me know
[00:50.88]And what if I what if I sin
[00:54.19]And what if I what if I break
[00:56.56]Yeah
[00:58.08]Then am I the monster
[01:00.24]Yeah
[01:01.60]Just let me know yeah
[01:04.78]Justin Bieber：
[01:05.72]I was fifteen when the world put me on a pedestal
[01:08.99]I had big dreams of doin' shows and making memories
[01:12.22]Made some bad moves tryin' to act cool upset by their jealousy uh
[01:15.80]Lifting me up
[01:16.60]Lifting me up
[01:17.86]Lifting me up
[01:18.65]Yeah
[01:19.38]And tearing me down
[01:20.28]Down
[01:20.76]Tearing me down
[01:21.66]Down down yeah
[01:22.28]I'll take responsibility for everything I've done
[01:25.27]Yeah
[01:25.58]Holding it against me like you're the holy one
[01:30.12]Yeah
[01:30.71]Justin Bieber：
[01:31.61]I had a chip on my shoulder had to let it go
[01:35.90]'Cause unforgiveness keeps them in control
[01:38.43]I came in with good intentions then I let it go
[01:42.28]And now I really wanna know
[01:43.75]Justin Bieber/Shawn Mendes：
[01:43.83]What if I what if I trip
[01:46.10]Oh
[01:47.02]What if I what if I fall
[01:49.22]I fall
[01:50.48]Then am I the monster
[01:52.83]Am I the monster
[01:54.30]Just let me know
[01:55.93]Let me know
[01:56.89]And what if I what if I sin
[01:59.33]Oh
[01:59.90]And what if I what if I break
[02:02.19]Yeah
[02:03.84]Then am I the monster
[02:05.95]Am I the monster
[02:07.33]Just let me know
[02:08.92]Oh please just let me know yeah
[02:11.71]Justin Bieber/Shawn Mendes：
[02:12.80]La-da-da-duh-duh
[02:14.76]Baby what if I fall down
[02:16.45]La-da-da-duh-duh-duh-na
[02:19.13]La-da-da-da-duh-duh
[02:22.32]La-da-da-duh-duh-duh-na
[02:25.06]La-da-da-duh-duh
[02:26.21]Please don't let me fall
[02:28.95]La-da-da-duh-duh-duh-na
[02:31.16]La-da-da-da-duh-duh
[02:32.47]Oh please don't let me fall
[02:34.87]
[02:35.48]La-da-da-duh-duh-duh-na
